mapper.insert: MERGE INTO REQUEST USING DUAL ON (request_date = to_char(#{requestDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (child_id = #{childId})) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (request_id, request_date, request_content1, request_content2, request_content3, request_content4, request_content5, parent_id, child_id, classroom_id) VALUES (REQUEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, to_char(#{requestDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{requestContent1}, #{requestContent2}, #{requestContent3}, #{requestContent4}, #{requestContent5}, #{parentId}, #{childId}, #{classroomId})
mapper.select: SELECT request_id AS requestId, request_date AS requestDate, request_content1 AS requestContent1, request_content2 AS requestContent2, request_content3 AS requestContent3, request_content4 AS requestContent4, request_content5 AS requestContent5, request_comment AS requestComment, request_stat1 AS requestStat1, request_stat2 AS requestStat2, request_stat3 AS requestStat3, request_stat4 AS requestStat4, request_stat5 AS requestStat5 FROM request WHERE TO_CHAR(request_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = #{requestDate} AND child_id = #{childId}

SELECT request_id AS requestId, request_content1 AS requestContent1, request_content2 AS requestContent2, request_content3 AS requestContent3, request_content4 AS requestContent4, request_content5 AS requestContent5, request_comment AS requestComment, request_stat1 AS requestStat1, request_stat2 AS requestStat2, request_stat3 AS requestStat3, request_stat4 AS requestStat4, request_stat5 AS requestStat5 FROM request WHERE request_id=#{requestId}
mapper.update: UPDATE request SET request_stat1 = #{requestStat1}, request_stat2 = #{requestStat2}, request_stat3 = #{requestStat3}, request_stat4 = #{requestStat4}, request_stat5 = #{requestStat5}, request_comment = #{requestComment} WHERE request_id = #{requestId}
